icu

Product Name*

icu


Product Version*

2.0

Vendor or Owner Name*

IBM

Vendor or Owner Contact

 

OpenOffice.org Contact*

Eike Rathke

Date of First Use / date of License

April 1 2002 / 2001

URL for Product Information*

http://icu-project.org/

URL for License*

 http://source.icu-project.org/repos/icu/icu/trunk/license.html

Purpose*

 The International Components for Unicode (ICU) is a C and C++ library that provides robust and full-featured Unicode support on a wide variety of platforms.

Type of Encryption*

none

Binary or Source Code?*

source

Remarks

If you encounter a bug in ICU itself or have to apply a patch to make it build on your platform, please file it under http://bugs.icu-project.org/trac/, additionally to the OOo issue. This enables the ICU team to track issues and provide a fix with one of their next ICU releases.
Please also add details to the corresponding OOo wiki page
Thank you.
